mapper.update: UPDATE commission_summary cs SET cs.commission_total = ( (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(o.commission_amount, 0)), 0) AS amount FROM commission_order o WHERE o.inviter_level_1 = cs.per_id) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(o.commission_amount, 0)), 0) AS amount FROM commission_order o WHERE o.inviter_level_2 = cs.per_id) ), cs.commission_balance = ( (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(o.commission_amount, 0)), 0) AS amount FROM commission_order o WHERE o.withdraw_status = '0' AND o.inviter_level_1 = cs.per_id AND o.creation_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(o.commission_amount, 0)), 0) AS amount FROM commission_order o WHERE o.withdraw_status = '0' AND o.inviter_level_2 = cs.per_id AND o.creation_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) )
